mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tauola dell' isole nuoue, le quali son nominate occidentali, & indiane per diuersi rispetti
Mondo nuovo il quale ha l'isole dell Indico occeano
Nüw Welt
Tavola dell' isole nuove, le quali son nominate occidentali & indiane per diversi rispetti
Münster, Sebastian, 1489-1552. Tabula nouarum insularum, quas diverses respectibus Occidentales & Indianas uocant
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Münster, Sebastian, 1489-1552
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 26 x 34 cm. on sheet 29 x 39 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map on 1 folded sheet, with Italian text "Mondo nuovo il quale ha l'isole dell Indico occeano ... " and number "14" on verso. Place names in Latin, except for "Die Nüw Welt" which appears on South America.
Title printed at top of sheet, outside the border of the map.
Detached from: Cosmographia universale ... / raccolta primo da diversi autori per Sebastiano Munstero ... In Colonia, Appresso gli heradi d'Arnoldo Byrckmanno, 1575.

A derivative of Münster's map "Tabula nouarum insularum, quas diverses respectibus Occidentales & Indianas uocant" (Basel, Heinrich Petri, 1540 and later) which is described by John Goss as "the earliest separate map of the Americas." Cf. The mapping of North America, Map 6, p. 24.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: America--Maps--Early works to 1800.
Western Hemisphere--Maps--Early works to 1800.
